heading: HR01020
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON HEALTH TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE PERFORMANCE OF THE VETERANS MEMORIAL MEDICAL CENTER (VMMC) AS THE PRIMARY MEDICAL FACILITY FOR THE HOSPITALIZATION AND MEDICAL CARE OF ELIGIBLE VETERANS AND DEPENDENTS WITH THE END  VIEW OF CHARTING IMMEDIATE POLICY MEASURES AND/OR REPORT SUBSTANTIAL RECOMMENDATIONS THAT WILL SECURE AND PROMOTE THE HEALTH CARE OF MILITARY VETERANS AND RETIREES IN THE ARMED FORCES OF THE PHILIPPINES
status: Pending with the Committee on VETERANS AFFAIRS AND WELFARE since 2017-07-26
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01020
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON HEALTH TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE PERFORMANCE OF THE VETERANS MEMORIAL MEDICAL CENTER (VMMC) AS THE PRIMARY MEDICAL FACILITY FOR THE HOSPITALIZATION AND MEDICAL CARE OF ELIGIBLE VETERANS AND DEPENDENTS WITH THE END VIEW OF CHARTING IMMEDIATE POLICY MEASURES AND/OR REPORT SUBSTANTIAL RECOMMENDATIONS THAT WILL SECURE AND PROMOTE THE HEALTH CARE OF MILITARY VETERANS AND RETIREES IN THE ARMED FORCES OF THE PHILIPPINES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ACOP, ROMEO M.
DATE FILED : 2017-05-24
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON VETERANS AFFAIRS AND WELFARE ON 2017-07-26
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2017-05-30;
